CustomField.description: Used to determine if Status has even been set to "Approved", FinReqs & RFCs should only generate when setting the PIDR to Approved for the first time.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to determine if Status has even been set to "Approved", FinReqs & RFCs should only generate when setting the PIDR to Approved for the first time.
CustomField.label: Has Been Approved
